{{Description|This plain bathes in an everlasting breeze. An ancient, monumental tree left behind by an ancient heroine speaks softly amidst the winds.|Windswept Wilderness, [[Viewpoints]]}}
{{Description|A valley surrounded by winds. In its middle grows a large oak tree.<br />The shade of the tree protects the Statue of The Seven built at its feet from the rain and the wind, like Vennessa once protected Mondstadt.|[[Expedition]] description}}
{{Location Intro|description=<p>It is the location where [[Vennessa]] is said to have ascended to [[Celestia]], where she became a god and now watches over [[Mondstadt]] as the Falcon of the West of the [[Four Winds]]. The massive oak tree is believed to have grown there after she ascended.</p>}}
